text: Swept Away is a 2002 romantic comedy movie. Madonna plays Amber Leighton. Elizabeth Banks plays Debi. Jeanne Tripplehorn plays Marina. The movie received negative reviews from the movie critics. It was a box office bomb. It made only $1,036,000, compared to the ten million dollars it cost to make. It received a Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture of 2002. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2002 romantic comedy movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies set in Greece Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies directed by Guy Ritchie
title: Swept Away (2002 movie)
